mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gilmore, Quincy Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 4 1862. By Telegraph from Point Pleasant 1862. Is Kelley's command included in the force you report I cannot leave here yet I want Capt Brook's here as soon as he can leave Wheeling Q.A. Gilmore Brig Genl Comdg 26Hm114pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Gilmore, Quincy Adams
Point Pleasant, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
